document.title: Reference for `eif_type_id'
document.paragraph:
2SYNOPSYS
#include "eif_gen_conf.h"
EIF_TYPE_ID eif_type_id (char * type);
2DESCRIPTION The eif_type_id() function returns the type identifier corresponding to type, which is the name of the type.
2RETURN VALUE The eif_type_id() function returns the type
2NOTES An error cannot be caught by a visible exception. The type is not necessary visible.
2CONFORMANCE ISE Eiffel 4. 3 and later.
2COMPATIBILITY
eif_type_id() is equivalent to eif_type_by_name(). With Eiffel 4. 2 and earlier, use eif_generic_type() for generic types.
2SEE ALSO
eif_reference_function(1) , eif_procedure(1) , eif_type(1), eif_name(1).
